verses.text: \w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3793"\w* \w came|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G2597"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w large|strong="G4183"\w* \w crowds|strong="G3793"\w* followed \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.
